Haste
[i]Killing Edge[/i] – Whenever Shiva deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card or copy a [i]Crit[/i] ability of another creature you control.
[i]Sol[/i] – Whenever Shiva deals combat damage to player, you gain that much life.
[i]Promote[/i] – Whenever three or more creatures you control deal combat damage to the same player this turn, transform Shiva.
